mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bots (user_id, name, description, site_url, is_active, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{name}, #{description}, #{siteUrl}, #{isActive}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, name, description, site_url, is_active, created_at, updated_at FROM bots WHERE id = #{id} AND is_active = TRUE
SELECT id, user_id, name, description, site_url, is_active, created_at, updated_at FROM bots WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND is_active = TRUE ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE bots SET name = #{name}, description = #{description}, site_url = #{siteUrl}, is_active = #{isActive}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
